Power.name: Accuracy 1
Power.Description: The character is an ace with ranged attacks.
Power.Effect: The character adds +1 to their Agility damage multiplier, and they gain a +1 bonus to Agility checks other than attacks.

Power.name: Accuracy 2
Power.Description: The character is a sharpshooter.
Power.Effect: The character adds +2 to their Agility damage multiplier, and they gain a bonus to Agility checks other than attacks.

Power.name: Accuracy 3
Power.Description: The character could hit a fly at one hundred paces.
Power.Effect: The character adds +3 to their Agility damage multiplier, and they gain a +3 bonus to Agility checks other than attacks.

Power.name: Accuracy 4
Power.Description: The character can out-target almost anyone.
Power.Effect: The character adds +4 to their Agility damage multiplier, and they gain a +4 bonus to Agility checks other than attacks.

Power.name: Additional Limbs
Power.Description: The character has extra limbs that can grab objects and attack foes.
Power.Effect: The character has an additional prehensile appendage (like a tail) or a symmetrical pair of them (like arms) that can be used to lift objects, use tools or otherwise take actions that normally require the use of a hand. This grants them an edge in Melee and Agility checks. A character can have as many additional limbs as they like—within reason—but they get no additional advantages for them.

Power.name: Advance
Power.Description: The character can advance their allies on the battlefield.
Power.Trigger: The character (or an ally in line of sight) stuns or defeats an enemy.
Power.Effect: Any allies in earshot can be affected, up to a number equal to the character's Ego defense. Each affected ally can immediately use a free movement action to move toward the enemy that triggered the reaction.

Power.name: Always Ready
Power.Description: The character prepared to fight.
Power.Effect: The character gains one additional reaction per round, which can be used only to activate a Martial Arts power.

Power.name: Anger
Power.Description: You won't like them when they're angry.
Power.Trigger: The character is harmed by an attack.
Power.Effect: The character becomes angry and uses that anger to increase their strength. For every 10 points of Focus they spend, they add to their Melee damage bonus and lose -2 from their Logic—and subsequently their Logic defense. While using this power, they cannot use any other powers that require concentration.

Power.name: Animal Bond
Power.Description: The character can communicate with an animal friend.
Power.Effect: The character can communicate telepathically with one animal of their choice, and they must have befriended the animal before. They cannot switch to another animal unless the animal dies, but they can select this power multiple times if desired. The communication can be verbal, visual or even more complex, such as imparting location information. There is no limit to the distance of the communication, as long as the character and the animal are in the same dimension. Animals with a telepathic bond are generally willing to communicate, even if they aren't friendly. Bonded animals often do whatever the character asks, even if it might put them in danger.

Power.name: Animal Communication
Power.Description: The character can communicate with a type of animal.
Power.Effect: The character can communicate telepathically with one taxonomic order of animals, such as birds, mammals, fish, amphibians and so on. They can call out to them as a group up to 500 spaces per rank away, and they can communicate specifically with ones they have met or at least seen. They cannot switch to another taxonomic order, but they can select this power multiple times if desired. The communication with the animals can be verbal, visual or even more complex, such as imparting location information. There is no limit to the distance of the communication, as long as the character and the animals are in the same dimension. Friendly animals often do whatever the character asks, as long as it doesn't put them in danger—and they may be willing to risk even that for one they consider a friend. Hostile animals simply ignore all such requests, which make them a poor choice for communication.

Power.name: Animated Illusion
Power.Description: By manipulating visual light, the character creates a moving hologram.
Power.Effect: The character creates a visual-only illusion anywhere in line of sight, within 50 spaces. The illusion can be anything up to four sizes larger than the character, and it can move freely within its limits. The character breaks concentration if they move beyond 50 spaces from the illusion or lose line of sight to it.

Power.name: Astral Form
Power.Description: The character can enter the Astral Plane.
Power.Effect: The character can project an avatar into the Astral Plane, leaving their physical body in a deep trance in the real world, where it is vulnerable to attack. While in the Astral Plane, they can interact with other characters in the Astral Plane, but they are intangible, invisible and generally undetectable in the real world. However, they can sense things in the real world. If the character is Rank 4 or higher, they can also take on a transparent form that can be seen in the real world. While in the Astral Plane, the character can fly, and in combat, their Flight Speed is equal to their rank times their Run Speed. Outside of combat, they can move 10 times as fast.

Power.name: Attack Stance
Power.Description: The character enters an aggressive attack stance, ready to strike in any direction.
Power.Effect: The character doubles their Melee ability bonus to damage.

Power.name: Banging Heads
Power.Description: The character takes two nearby enemies and slams their heads into each other.
Power.Effect: The character makes one Melee check against the Melee defense scores of two enemies within reach. If the attack fails against either foe, it fails entirely. If the attack is a success against both foes, each enemy takes full damage. On a Fantastic success, each enemy is also knocked prone.

Power.name: Battle Plan
Power.Description: The character always has a plan.
Power.Effect: The character inspires one or more allies of their choice in earshot, up to the character's Vigilance. Inspired allies gain an edge on all action checks until the start of the character's next turn.

Power.name: Blazing-Fast Fists
Power.Description: The character can attack superfast.
Power.Effect: The character has an edge on all Melee attacks.

Power.name: Blink
Power.Description: The character teleports a short distance away.
Power.Effect: The character teleports into a clear space they can see or have been to, up to their rank in spaces away. If someone was about to attack them and they are now out of reach or line of sight, the attack automatically fails. If they are still within reach or line of sight, the attack has trouble instead.

Power.name: Blink Barrage
Power.Description: The character teleports rapidly around an opponent.
Power.Effect: The character teleports several times in quick succession and winds up in a clear space they can see or have been to, up to their rank in spaces away. Any attacks have trouble against them for one round.

Power.name: Blink Defense
Power.Description: The character teleports a short distance away.
Power.Trigger: The character or an ally within reach is the subject of a ranged attack.
Power.Effect: The character pops away just as the attack reaches them and then pops back into the same space, leaving the projectile behind. The character makes an Ego check with an edge against the attacker's Agility check result. On a success, the projectile from the attack is teleported away, someplace safe. On a Fantastic success, the attack is turned against the attacker, using the Ego check the character just made as the attack check.

Power.name: Blur
Power.Description: The character moves like a blur!
Power.Effect: Any attacks against the character have trouble.

Power.name: Body Sheet
Power.Description: The character can flatten themselves like a sheet.
Power.Trigger: The character falls or is the target of an attack.
Power.Effect: The character gains Health Damage Reduction 3, but they cannot make attacks. They gain a Glide Speed equal to double their Run Speed.
Power.statAdjust: calc:Combat Glide Speed;2 x Combat Run Speed,calc:Glide Speed;2 x Combat Run Speed. replace:Health Dmg Reduction;3

Power.name: Body Sphere
Power.Description: The character can form their body into a protective sphere.
Power.Trigger: The character or an ally is the target of an attack.
Power.Effect: The character forms their body into a sphere, protecting up to one ally per rank squeezed into the same space. Those inside the sphere gain Health Damage Reduction 3 against outside attacks, but they cannot move on their own until the character releases them. Alternatively, if the attacker is within the character's reach, the character can make an Agility check against the target’s Agility defense. On a success, the character envelops the attacker, grabbing them. On a Fantastic success, the character closes the sphere enough to pin the attacker too.

Power.name: Bolts of Balthakk
Power.Description: The character fires enchanted bolts of electricity from their fingers.
Power.Effect: The character makes an Ego check with an edge against the Agility defense of a target in their line of sight. For this attack, add +1 to the character's Agility damage bonus for every 2 points of Focus they spend. On a success, an affected target takes that total damage. On a Fantastic success, an affected target takes double that total damage and is stunned for one round.

Power.name: Boost Powers
Power.Description: The character turbocharges another character's powers!
Power.Effect: The character picks one character within 5 spaces and boosts all of their powers. If the powers have ranges or effective areas or durations, these are doubled. If the powers affect a damage multiplier, add 1 to the effects. Any effects that normally happen with a Fantastic success automatically happen on any success, not just a Fantastic one. If the target's powers have costs, the character must pay the highest of them or a minimum of 15 Focus.

Power.name: Borrow Senses
Power.Description: The character can use another person's senses.
Power.Effect: The character can use the full senses of someone or something with whom they have established a telepathic link. While they do, they retain the use of their own too.

Power.name: Bounce Back
Power.Description: The character bounces back from even the hardest falls.
Power.Trigger: The character takes damage from a fall or is knocked prone.
Power.Effect: The fall doesn't damage the character. If they are prone, they stand up. If they'd like, they can also jump a number of spaces up to their Run Speed.

Power.name: Brace for Impact
Power.Description: The character mentally toughens themselves for a fight.
Power.Trigger: An enemy deals physical damage to the character.
Power.Effect: For every point of Focus spent, the character can ignore 1 point of Health damage dealt by the attack.

Power.name: Brain Drain
Power.Description: The character consumes the energies of another.
Power.Effect: The character makes an Ego attack against the target's Vigilance. If it succeeds, the target takes regular Focus damage, and the character heals half that much Focus for themselves. On a Fantastic success, the character heals their full Focus damage instead.

Power.name: Brawling
Power.Description: The character has the moves and is hard to hit.
Power.Effect: The character can use their Melee defense score against Agility attacks too.

Power.name: Brilliance 1
Power.Description: The character puts their brain to work.
Power.Effect: The character adds +1 to their Logic damage multiplier, and they gain a bonus to Logic checks other than attacks.

Power.name: Brilliance 2
Power.Description: Everything makes more sense to the character.
Power.Effect: The character adds +2 to their Logic damage multiplier, and they gain a +2 bonus to Logic checks other than attacks.

Power.name: Brilliance 3
Power.Description: Little can stop the character's mind.
Power.Effect: The character adds +3 to their Logic damage multiplier, and they gain a +3 bonus to Logic checks other than attacks.

Power.name: Brilliance 4
Power.Description: The character's intelligence is unparalleled.
Power.Effect: The character adds +4 to their Logic damage multiplier, and they gain a bonus to Logic checks other than attacks.

Power.name: Bump Power
Power.Description: The character bumps up another character's power.
Power.Effect: The character picks one power from another character within 5 spaces and boosts it. If the power has ranges or effective areas or durations, these are doubled. If the power affects a damage multiplier, add 1 to the effect. Any effects that normally happen with a Fantastic success automatically happen on any success, not just a Fantastic one. If the power has a cost, the character must pay it as well, with a minimum of 5 Focus.

Power.name: Catch Bullets
Power.Description: The character is fast enough to catch bullets—safely!
Power.Trigger: A ranged attack using physical projectiles (arrows, bullets, etc.) is made against the character or a character within their reach.
Power.Effect: The character makes an Agility check, using the attacker's attack result as the target number. If the check succeeds, the attack is nullified. On a Fantastic success, the character gets their reaction back.

Power.name: Chain Strikes
Power.Description: The character unleashes a hail of strikes.
Power.Effect: The character makes a close attack with an edge. If the attack is a success, the enemy takes regular damage. On a Fantastic success, the character can also make an additional Chain Strike.

Power.name: Change Of Plans
Power.Description: The character thinks of a better way.
Power.Trigger: An ally has trouble on an action check.
Power.Effect: The ally gains an edge on that action check.

Power.name: Cloak
Power.Description: The character makes people believe they're not there.
Power.Effect: The character uses a mirage to block their presence from the minds of people within 20 spaces per rank. Cameras can still record them, but anyone looking in the character's direction sees nothing. The target number for anyone trying to detect the character is the character's Logic defense.

Power.name: Cloak Group
Power.Description: The character mentally hides themselves and their friends.
Power.Effect: Using a mirage, the character blocks their presence—and the presence of up to one other person per rank, within 10 spaces—from the minds of people within 20 spaces per rank. Cameras can still record them, but anyone looking in the characters' direction sees nothing. The target number for anyone trying to detect the character or the others protected is the character's Logic defense.

Power.name: Clobber
Power.Description: The character pummels their foe with enough force to knock them flat.
Power.Effect: The character makes a close attack against an enemy. If the attack is a success, the enemy takes regular damage. On a Fantastic success, the enemy takes double damage and is knocked prone.

Power.name: Clone Moves
Power.Description: The character duplicates another character's combat moves.
Power.Effect: The character picks another character within 10 spaces and in their line of sight and duplicates all their powers that could be selected with the Special Training origin. They can now use those powers as if they were always theirs. If the copied powers have costs, the character must pay the highest of them, or a minimum of 5 Focus. When the character uses a copied power, they must pay any cost normally as well.

Power.name: Clone Powers
Power.Description: The character duplicates all of another character's powers.
Power.Effect: The character picks another character within 10 spaces and duplicates all of their powers. They can now use those powers as if they were always theirs. If the target's powers have costs, the character must pay the highest of them, or a minimum of 15 Focus. When the character uses a copied power, they must pay any cost normally as well.

Power.name: Coiling Crush
Power.Description: The character wraps around a target and crushes it.
Power.Effect: The character makes a Melee attack. On a success, the enemy is paralyzed. On a Fantastic success, the enemy also takes regular damage. During the character's subsequent turns, they can spend their movement action to make a Melee check against the enemy's Resilience. If this succeeds, they inflict regular Health damage. On a Fantastic success, they do double damage instead. During the paralyzed enemy's turn, they can make a Melee check against the character's Melee defense to break free.

Power.name: Combat Support
Power.Description: The character gives a friend a hand.
Power.Effect: Once per battle, the character chooses an ally in earshot. If the ally makes an action check before the start of the character's next turn, the ally automatically rolls a 1 on their Marvel die, and that die cannot be affected by trouble.

Power.name: Combat Trickery
Power.Description: The character is a tricky one!
Power.Effect: Once per battle, when the character is attacking targets of equal or higher rank, the character automatically rolls a 1 on their Marvel die, and that die cannot be affected by trouble. If attacking multiple targets, all must be of equal or higher rank.

Power.name: Command
Power.Description: The character forces someone to follow an order.
Power.Effect: The character gives an order to a target with whom they've established a Telepathic Link. The character makes a Logic check against the target's Logic defense. On a success, the target complies. On a Fantastic success, the character gains an edge the next time they use this power against this same target. Orders must be single-action. Harmful orders incur trouble, self-harm doubles trouble.

Power.name: Control Fog
Power.Description: The character can create or dispel a thick fog.
Power.Effect: The character creates a thick fog for up to 50 spaces per rank around them that blocks all line of sight beyond 10 spaces. They can also dispel any fog in a similar area.

Power.name: Control Weather
Power.Description: The character can make it rain.
Power.Effect: It starts to rain in an area up to 5 miles across times the character's rank, centered on the character. All ranges are cut in half. Movement is not affected.

Power.name: Control Weather 2
Power.Description: The character can make it storm.
Power.Effect: It starts to storm in an area up to 5 miles across times the character's rank, centered on the character. All ranges and speeds are cut in half.

Power.name: Control Weather 3
Power.Description: The character creates a thunderstorm.
Power.Effect: It starts to storm in an area up to 5 miles across times the character's rank, centered on the character. All ranges and speeds are cut in half. If the character also has Elemental Blast (Electricity), they can use it as a reaction when attacked while this power is active.

Power.name: Control Weather 4
Power.Description: The character generates a hurricane.
Power.Effect: It starts to storm in an area up to 5 miles across times the character's rank, centered on the character. All ranges and speeds are cut to one quarter normal, and flying is impossible. If the character has Elemental Barrage (Electricity), they can use it as a reaction when attacked while this power is active.

Power.name: Dimensional Portal
Power.Description: The character opens a portal to another place.
Power.Effect: The character opens a glowing portal in a space next to them that moves anything that enters it between that space and its destination, which forms a matched glowing portal in the other place. The other end of the portal must be in a clear space in another dimension that the character has been to. Anything can move through the portal in either direction until it is closed, which the character can do at will.

Power.name: Dimensional Travel
Power.Description: The character moves from one dimension to another.
Power.Effect: The character instantly moves from their current dimension to another dimension within the same universe. For instance, from Earth to Asgard, Limbo, or K'un-Lun. When they move to the other dimension, they can arrive in any place they've been to before. Otherwise, they arrive at the most common entrance to that dimension.

Power.name: Dimensional Travel Other
Power.Description: The character sends someone to another dimension.
Power.Effect: The character makes an Ego check against the Vigilance defense of a target they have grabbed. On a success, the character can send the target to another dimension. The target can be sent to any location in that dimension that the character has been to before. Otherwise, the target arrives at the most common entrance to that dimension.

Power.name: Dimensional Travel Together
Power.Description: The character brings someone with them to another dimension.
Power.Effect: The character moves to a different dimension, taking any person they are touching with them. If the target does not wish to come along, the character must grab them first. When they move to the other dimension, they can arrive in any place they've been to before. Otherwise, they arrive at the most common entrance to that dimension.

Power.name: Discipline 1
Power.Description: The character works to hone their power.
Power.Effect: The character adds +1 to their Ego damage multiplier and they gain a bonus to Ego checks other than attacks.
Power.statAdjust: replace:Ego Dmg Multiplier;1, add:Ego Non-Combant Check;1

Power.name: Discipline 2
Power.Description: The character is more in touch with their power than ever.
Power.Effect: The character adds +2 to their Ego damage multiplier, and they gain a bonus to Ego checks other than attacks.
Power.statAdjust: replace:Ego Dmg Multiplier;2, add:Ego Non-Combant Check;1

Power.name: Discipline 3
Power.Description: Few can top the character's grasp on their power.
Power.Effect: The character adds +3 to their Ego damage multiplier, and they gain a +3 bonus to Ego checks other than attacks.
Power.statAdjust: replace:Ego Dmg Multiplier;3, add:Ego Non-Combant Check;1

Power.name: Discipline 4
Power.Description: The character has mastered their power.
Power.Effect: The character adds +4 to their Ego damage multiplier, and they gain a bonus to Ego checks other than attacks.
Power.statAdjust: replace:Ego Dmg Multiplier;4, add:Ego Non-Combant Check;1

Power.name: Disguise
Power.Description: The character appears to be someone else.
Power.Effect: The character instantly alters their appearance so that they appear to be someone else. The target number for anyone trying to see through the disguise is the character's Ego defense. If the character is impersonating someone known to the other person, that person has an edge.

Power.name: Dispel Spell
Power.Description: The character puts an end to a foe's magic.
Power.Effect: The character makes an Ego check against the Ego defense of a target using a magic power that requires concentration. On a success, the target's concentration on that power is broken. On a Fantastic success, the target's concentration is broken entirely.

Power.name: Disrupt Electronics
Power.Description: The character can scramble electronics by moving through them.
Power.Effect: When phasing through electronics, the character can scramble them, causing them to either shut down or crash. In the case of powers that are Tech Reliant (and feature electronics), they are unusable for 1 turn while they reboot.

Power.name: Disrupt Nerves
Power.Description: The character can scramble someone's nervous system.
Power.Effect: When phasing through a person, the character can attempt to scramble their nervous system. The character makes an Ego check against the target's Resilience defense. On a success, the target is stunned for one round. On a Fantastic success, the target also falls prone.

Power.name: Disrupt Person
Power.Description: The character can hurt someone with their phasing powers.
Power.Effect: The character becomes slightly solid while phasing themselves or a phased weapon through someone. They make a close attack. On a success, the attack does normal damage, ignoring any Health Damage Reduction. On a Fantastic success, the attack does double damage instead, ignoring any Health Damage Reduction, and the target is stunned for one round.

Power.name: Do This All Day
Power.Description: The character draws on their inner strength to heal themselves.
Power.Effect: The character heals 2 points of Health for every point of Focus they spend.

Power.name: Domination
Power.Description: The character forces someone to follow their orders—permanently.
Power.Effect: The character dominates a target with whom they've established a Telepathic Link and who has no Focus left. The character makes a Logic check with trouble against the target's Logic defense. On a success, the target is completely dominated and will follow the character's orders. On a Fantastic success, the character gains an edge the next time they use this power against the same target. The result of the check is the target number for any attempts by the target to end the domination. Harmful orders give the target a Logic check, Heroic targets get an edge, and self-harm doubles the edge.

Power.name: Double Tap
Power.Description: To be twice as sure.
Power.Effect: The character makes a ranged attack against an enemy within 2 spaces. On a success, the enemy takes regular damage. On a Fantastic success, the enemy takes double damage and is bleeding.

Power.name: Edit Memory
Power.Description: The character alters someone's memory.
Power.Effect: The character alters the memory of a target with whom they've established a Telepathic Link. This can range from erasing a chunk of memory to implanting entirely new memories. The Narrator sets the target number based on complexity. The character makes a Logic check against the target's Logic defense. On a success, the memories are altered. On a Fantastic success, the target has trouble on checks to refute such memories in the future. If the target doubts the edited memory, they can make a Logic check to recover original memories. On success, they remember both versions; on Fantastic success, they know who did it.

Power.name: Elemental Barrage
Power.Description: The character hurls a barrage of their element at their foes.
Power.Effect: The character designates a space within their line of sight. The attack can affect every enemy within 10 spaces of that point. The character makes a single Ego check and compares it to each target's Resilience defense. Affected enemies take half regular damage. On a Fantastic success, they take full regular damage and the elemental type's special effect.

Power.name: Elemental Barrier
Power.Description: The character forms a wall of their element.
Power.Effect: The character forms a wall of their element within line of sight and up to 10 spaces per rank away. It covers up to 2 spaces across per rank. The character makes an Agility check against targets in affected spaces. On a success, the character chooses the side the target ends up on. On a failure, the target chooses. On a Fantastic success, the target suffers the element's special effect. Attacks against the barrier are against the character's Ego defense. Attacks ≤10 damage are absorbed; >10 damage destroy the barrier, leaving those behind unharmed.

Power.name: Elemental Blast
Power.Description: The character blasts a foe with their element.
Power.Effect: The character makes a ranged attack with an edge at an enemy in line of sight. Add +1 to Agility damage bonus for every 2 points of Focus spent. On success, the target takes that total damage. On a Fantastic success, the target takes double damage and suffers the elemental type's special effect.

Power.name: Elemental Burst
Power.Description: The character fires a burst of their element.
Power.Effect: The character makes a ranged attack against an enemy in line of sight. On success, it inflicts regular damage. On a Fantastic success, the enemy takes double damage and the elemental type's special effect.

Power.name: Elemental Form
Power.Description: The character's body is made of their element.
Power.Effect: The character's body is entirely made of their element, giving them a steady supply to use and making them essentially unkillable. When they lose all Health, the form loses cohesion and falls apart. At ≥1 Health, they can reform. To use the elemental body in unusual ways, pick Plasticity powers. To be fully human at times, pick Shape-Shift.

Power.name: Elemental Grab
Power.Description: The character uses their element to snare a target.
Power.Effect: The character makes an Ego attack against a target's Melee defense within 5 spaces times the character's rank. On a success, the character grabs the target with their element. On a Fantastic success, the target can also be pinned and suffers the element's special effect. Breaking free requires a successful Melee check against target number 20.

Power.name: Elemental Infusion
Power.Description: The character infuses a weapon with their element.
Power.Effect: The character infuses their energy into a handheld weapon in their grasp. When the character gets a Fantastic attack with the weapon, add the energy's special effect.

Power.name: Elemental Prison
Power.Description: The character can create a cage of their element.
Power.Cost: Same as the character's Elemental Protection power
Power.Effect: The character picks a point within their line of sight and traps chosen targets within up to 5 spaces times their rank in a prison of their element. The character makes an Ego check against targets' Agility defense. On each success, the target is trapped. On a Fantastic success, imprisoned people suffer full damage and the element's special effect. Attacks against the prison are absorbed as if against Elemental Protection; if damage exceeds the protection, the prison is destroyed but no one inside is harmed.

Power.name: Elemental Protection
Power.Description: The character protects themselves with their element.
Power.Trigger: The character is attacked or otherwise in danger
Power.Effect: Any attacks against the character that do 10 points of damage or less are absorbed; protection continues. If an attack does more than 10 points of damage, it destroys the protection. The character remains unharmed either way.

Power.name: Elemental Protection 2
Power.Description: The character's elemental protection is like armor.
Power.Trigger: The character is attacked or otherwise in danger
Power.Effect: Any attacks against the character that do 20 points of damage or less are absorbed; protection continues. If an attack does more than 20 points of damage, it destroys the protection. The character remains unharmed either way.

Power.name: Elemental Protection 3
Power.Description: The character's elemental protection is like a tank.
Power.Trigger: The character is attacked or otherwise in danger
Power.Effect: Any attacks against the character that do 30 points of damage or less are absorbed; protection continues. If an attack does more than 30 points of damage, it destroys the protection. The character remains unharmed either way.

Power.name: Elemental Protection 4
Power.Description: The character's elemental protection is like a fortress.
Power.Trigger: The character is attacked or otherwise in danger
Power.Effect: Any attacks against the character that do 40 points of damage or less are absorbed; protection continues. If an attack does more than 40 points of damage, it destroys the protection. The character remains unharmed either way.

Power.name: Elemental Push
Power.Description: The character can move a target with their element.
Power.Effect: The character makes an Ego attack against the target's Agility defense. On a success, the character can move the target in any direction, up to 1 space times the character's rank. On a Fantastic success, the target also takes regular damage, is knocked prone, and suffers the element's special effect.

Power.name: Elemental Reinforcement
Power.Description: The character reinforces their powers with their element.
Power.Trigger: Damage gets through an elemental power
Power.Effect: The character can transfer any Health damage that gets through an elemental power that grants damage protection to their Focus instead, leaving the protection intact.

Power.name: Elemental Ricochet
Power.Description: The character bounces the burst off one foe and into another.
Power.Effect: The character makes a ranged attack against a target in line of sight. On a success, it inflicts regular damage. On a Fantastic success, energy bounces to another target in line of sight, allowing a new attack with added range. This repeats until an attack is not Fantastic.

Power.name: Elemental Sphere
Power.Description: The character can create a protective sphere of their element.
Power.Cost: Same as the character's Elemental Protection power
Power.Effect: The character envelops themselves—and any chosen people within up to 5 spaces times their rank—in a protective sphere of their element. Ego check against Agility defense of unwanted characters allows moving them outside. On a Fantastic success, moved people take full damage and the element's special effect. Attacks against the sphere are absorbed as Elemental Protection. If damage exceeds protection, the sphere is destroyed but no one inside is harmed.

Power.name: Elemental Suffocation
Power.Description: The character envelops a target's head in an element.
Power.Trigger: The target is grabbed with Elemental Grab
Power.Effect: The character makes an Ego attack against the grabbed target's Resilience defense. On a success, the target takes regular damage. On a Fantastic success, the target can also be pinned and suffers the element's special effect. With unsuitable elements, this power chokes the target instead.

Power.name: Energy Absorption
Power.Description: The character turns damage into power.
Power.Effect: The character can take any Health damage (after reduction), ignore it, and add that number to Focus instead, up to double maximum. Extra Focus fades after combat.

Power.name: Environmental Protection
Power.Description: Environmental effects don't bother the character.
Power.Effect: The character is unharmed by intense cold or heat, deep-sea pressure, or the radiation and vacuum of space. The player can select any combination of protections that fits the character concept.

Power.name: ESP
Power.Description: The character can sense the presence of others.
Power.Effect: The character can sense the presence of others within 100 spaces per rank, learning their location and general status. Can detect super-powers. Targets attempting to remain undetected require Logic checks against their Vigilance. Fantastic success also identifies the source of powers.

Power.name: Evasion
Power.Description: The character can twist or dodge quickly.
Power.Effect: The character can use their Agility defense score against Melee attacks as well.

Power.name: Exorcism
Power.Description: The character removes an intruder from someone's body.
Power.Effect: The character makes an Ego check against a possessor's Ego defense. On success, the possessor's concentration is broken, ending the possession. On a Fantastic success, all of the possessor's concentrations are broken, and the possessor is stunned for one round.

Power.name: Exploit
Power.Description: The character finds a weak spot and exploits it.
Power.Trigger: A Fantastic success on an attack using the character's weapon that deals at least 1 point of damage
Power.Effect: The character makes a Melee attack against the target's Resilience defense. On success, the damage ignores Health Damage Reduction. On a Fantastic success, the target suffers double damage and the weapon's special effect.

Power.name: Extend Invisibility
Power.Description: Extends the duration of Invisibility beyond its normal limits.
Power.Effect: Makes one person or object within reach invisible. Can be one size bigger than the character per rank.

Power.name: Extended Reach 1
Power.Description: Increases the reach of melee attacks slightly.
Power.Effect: The character's reach quadruples.

Power.name: Extended Reach 2
Power.Description: Further increases the reach of melee attacks.
Power.Effect: The character's reach is 10 times normal.

Power.name: Fast Attacks
Power.Description: Grants bonus edge when making multiple attacks in a turn.
Power.Effect: Splits attack to make two close attacks against separate targets within reach, or focus on one. Make a single Melee check. Success: half damage; Fantastic success: full damage and bonus attack against any target within reach.

Power.name: Fast Hands
Power.Description: Allows quick manipulation of objects or tools.
Power.Effect: Gain one additional reaction per round, usable only to trigger a Ranged Weapons power.

Power.name: Fast Strikes
Power.Description: Improves the speed of striking actions, giving edge on attack rolls.
Power.Effect: Splits attack to make two close attacks against separate targets within reach, or focus on one. Make one Melee check. Success: half damage; Fantastic success: full damage.

Power.name: Flames of the Faltine
Power.Description: Generates intense magical flames from the Faltine, causing damage to enemies.
Power.Effect: Ego attack against Agility defense of a target in line of sight. Success: regular damage; Fantastic success: double damage and 5 points of ongoing damage each round until extinguished.

Power.name: Flare
Power.Description: Emits a bright burst of light, potentially blinding foes.
Power.Effect: Ego attack vs Vigilance of all enemies within 5 spaces. Success: blinded for one turn; Fantastic success: also takes regular damage.

Power.name: Flexible Bones 1
Power.Description: Bones are more pliable, reducing injury from falls or blunt trauma.
Power.Effect: Health Damage Reduction 1. Edge on Agility checks for contortion and escape.

Power.name: Flexible Bones 2
Power.Description: Further reduces damage from impacts, allowing more extreme contortions.
Power.Effect: Health Damage Reduction 2. Double edge on Agility checks for contortion and escape.

Power.name: Flexible Fingers
Power.Description: Increases manual dexterity for delicate tasks.
Power.Effect: With a Standard action, automatically pick any lock or shape hands into almost any simple tool.

Power.name: Flight 1
Power.Description: Grants the ability to fly at a basic level.
Power.Effect: Combat Flight Speed = Rank × Run Speed. Outside combat: move 3× Flight Speed.
Power.statAdjust: calc:Combat Flight Speed;Rank x Run Speed, calc:Flight Speed;Rank x Run Speed x 3

Power.name: Flight 2
Power.Description: Improves flying speed and maneuverability.
Power.Effect: Outside combat: fly up to 50× Flight Speed.
Power.statAdjust: calc:Flight Speed; Combat Flight Speed x 50

Power.name: Flying Double Kick
Power.Description: Allows a kick while airborne, with extra damage or edge.
Power.Effect: Close attack against two enemies within reach. Success: regular damage; Fantastic success: double damage and knocked prone.

Power.name: Focus Fire
Power.Description: Targets a single enemy with coordinated attacks, increasing damage or accuracy.
Power.Effect: Calls out an enemy in line of sight. Allies of choice in earshot gain an edge on all action checks against that enemy.

Power.name: Focused Fury
Power.Description: Grants a bonus when attacking the same target repeatedly.
Power.Effect: Close attack with edge. Add +1 to Melee damage for every 2 Focus spent. Success: total damage; Fantastic success: double total damage and weapon special effect.

Power.name: Focused Strike
Power.Description: A precise attack that ignores some defenses.
Power.Effect: Close attack. Add +1 to Melee damage for every 2 Focus spent. Success: total damage; Fantastic success: double total damage and target stunned for one round.

Power.name: Fool
Power.Description: Imposes disadvantage on opponents’ perception or attacks through trickery.
Power.Effect: Alters appearance in minds of anyone within 20 spaces per rank. Cameras see normally. Target number to see through illusion = Logic defense. Known targets: edge applied.

Power.name: Furious Attacks
Power.Description: Increases damage output when enraged.
Power.Effect: Split attack against two targets within reach or focus on one. Add +1 to Melee damage for every 2 Focus spent. Success: half total damage; Fantastic success: full total damage and weapon's special effect.

Power.name: Grand Mirage
Power.Description: Creates a large-scale illusion affecting multiple targets.
Power.Effect: Creates a full-sensory mirage affecting everyone in a Telepathic Network in the same locale. Mirage can move freely.

Power.name: Grand Fool
Power.Description: An enhanced version of Fool affecting a wider area.
Power.Effect: Alters appearance of self and up to one other person per rank within 10 spaces. Target number to see through illusion = Logic defense. Known targets: edge applied.

Power.name: Grand Illusion
Power.Description: A powerful illusion that can deceive multiple senses over a wide area.
Power.Effect: Creates a sound and sight illusion anywhere in line of sight, up to 5 sizes larger than the character. Can move freely within limits. Breaks concentration if character moves beyond 50 spaces or loses line of sight.

Power.name: Grappling Technique
Power.Description: Grants edge on grapple or hold maneuvers.
Power.Effect: Close attack. Success: target takes regular damage and is grabbed; Fantastic success: double damage and pinned.

Power.name: Ground-Shaking Stomp
Power.Description: A stomp that can knock down or damage nearby opponents.
Power.Effect: Melee check vs Agility of all targets within reach + rank in spaces. Success: half regular damage; Fantastic success: full damage and knocked prone.

Power.name: Group Flight
Power.Description: Allows multiple allies to fly together under coordinated control.
Power.Effect: For each point of Ego, can carry one ally into the air. Flight Speed of group is half character's. Allies must remain within 5 spaces × rank. Can release any/all allies at any time.

Power.name: Group Invisibility
Power.Description: Makes a group of allies invisible simultaneously.
Power.Effect: For each point of Ego, make one person/object invisible, including self. Each can be one size bigger than the character per rank.

Power.name: Group Levitation
Power.Description: Allows multiple targets to levitate at once.
Power.Effect: Move up to one person per rank through air in any direction at Run Speed. Targets must remain within 5 spaces × rank. If target resists, must be grabbed first.

Power.name: Grow 1
Power.Description: Slightly increases the size and strength of the character.
Power.Effect: Can grow up to Huge size. Can return to normal size at will.

Power.name: Grow 2
Power.Description: Further increases size and strength.
Power.Effect: Can grow up to Gigantic size. Can return to normal size at will.

Power.name: Grow 3
Power.Description: Significantly increases size and strength.
Power.Effect: Can grow up to the size of a house. Can return to normal size at will.

Power.name: Grow 4
Power.Description: Maximizes size and strength growth.
Power.Effect: Can grow up to Gargantuan size. Can return to normal size at will.

Power.name: Growing Attack
Power.Description: Attacks become stronger as the character grows.
Power.Effect: Close attack with an edge. Success: damage for size being grown to; Fantastic success: double damage and target stunned.

Power.name: Headshot
Power.Description: Aimed attack targeting the head with increased damage or critical chance.
Power.Effect: Ranged attack on enemy. Success: double damage; Fantastic: triple damage. Any damage also stuns target one round.

Power.name: Healing Factor
Power.Description: Grants rapid regeneration of wounds over time.
Power.Effect: At end of turn, regain Health equal to Resilience. Works outside combat too.

Power.name: Heightened Senses
Power.Description: Improves perception, allowing edge on detection and awareness checks.
Power.Effect: Senses twice as far as normal. Edge on Vigilance checks to perceive. Enemies have trouble sneaking past.

Power.name: Heightened Senses 2
Power.Description: Further enhances perception, detecting more subtle cues.
Power.Effect: The character can sense things roughly four times as far as normal. They can compensate for lost senses (e.g., if blinded or deafened), listen to heartbeats to detect lying (not 100% reliable), have double edge on Vigilance checks, and enemies have double trouble on sneaking checks.

Power.name: Hellfire Chains
Power.Description: Conjures chains of mystical fire to bind or damage enemies.
Power.Effect: Summons chains covered in hellfire to bind or smash targets. Ego attack vs target. Success: regular Health damage; Fantastic success: grabbed and paralyzed. Subsequent rounds: Ego check vs Resilience for Health + Focus damage. Break free: Melee check target 20.

Power.name: Hex Bolt
Power.Description: Launches a magical bolt that can damage or curse a target.
Power.Effect: Ego attack vs Agility. Success: regular damage; Fantastic success: double damage + target trouble for one round.

Power.name: Hit and Run
Power.Description: Allows quick attack and disengage with minimal risk of reprisal.
Power.Effect: Close attack with edge. Success: regular damage + free movement up to half Run Speed. Fantastic success: double damage + weapon's special effect.

Power.name: Hit the Dirt
Power.Description: Grants edge on dropping prone to avoid attacks.
Power.Trigger: Enemy attack on ally within earshot
Power.Effect: All allies within earshot may fall prone to avoid attack. If ineligible, attack automatically fails.

Power.name: Hurled Shield Bash
Power.Description: Throws a shield at a target for damage or to knock them back.
Power.Effect: Ranged attack on enemy. Success: regular damage; Fantastic success: double damage + knocked prone. Shield returns to character.

Power.name: Hurled Shield Block
Power.Description: Blocks incoming attacks while the shield is thrown.
Power.Effect: Ally gains Health Damage Reduction equal to character's Shield power. Shield returns to character.

Power.name: Hurled Shield Deflection
Power.Description: Deflects attacks using a thrown shield.
Power.Effect: Enemy has trouble on the attack. Shield returns to character.

Power.name: Iconic Weapon
Power.Description: Summons or enhances a legendary weapon with extra effects.
Power.Effect: The character owns and uses a unique weapon (e.g., Mjolnir or Captain America's shield). Must be approved by Narrator. Can be taken multiple times with different weapons.

Power.name: Icy Tendrils of Ikthalon
Power.Description: Produces freezing tendrils to immobilize or damage targets.
Power.Effect: Ego check vs Agility. Success: regular damage; Fantastic: double damage + target paralyzed by ice.

Power.name: Illumination
Power.Description: Creates light to reveal hidden enemies or objects.
Power.Effect: Illuminates an object/point in line of sight within 50 spaces. Bright light. Concentration can be maintained even if moving out of range/line of sight.

Power.name: Images of Ikonn
Power.Description: Generates illusory duplicates to confuse enemies.
Power.Effect: Create one sound and sight illusion duplicate per rank of a known person. Duplicates move up to 10 spaces, can swap places, mimic attacks. Can see through illusions with double edge on Ego check.

Power.name: Immovable
Power.Description: Grants stability, making the character resistant to being moved or knocked down.
Power.Effect: Reduce knockback by 1 space per point of Melee defense.

Power.name: Information Upload
Power.Description: Instantly transfers knowledge to oneself or allies.
Power.Effect: Transmit knowledge or labels to a target via telepathy. Label lasts until target sleeps. Almost instantaneous transmission of any other knowledge.

Power.name: Inspiration
Power.Description: Boosts morale, granting edge or bonuses to allies’ rolls.
Power.Effect: Inspire an ally in earshot. Ally gains edge on all action checks until start of character's next turn.

Power.name: Instant Replay
Power.Description: Allows repeating an action or attack for improved effect.
Power.Effect: Once per battle, make a second attempt at a failed check, replacing the first attempt.

Power.name: Integrity
Power.Description: Grants resistance to mental or moral manipulation.
Power.Effect: Can use Logic defense against Ego attacks.
Power.statAdjust: replace:Ego Defence Score; Logic Defence Score

Power.name: Invisibility
Power.Description: Renders the character unseen by normal vision.
Power.Effect: Character becomes invisible. Edge on Agility checks to sneak, enemies have trouble on Vigilance checks. Moving objects harder to spot.

Power.name: Jinx
Power.Description: Causes bad luck or disadvantage to a target.
Power.Effect: Ego check vs target's Ego. Success: target has trouble on all actions. Fantastic: target loses next standard action.

Power.name: Jump 1
Power.Description: Grants the ability to leap great distances.
Power.Effect: Gain Jump movement mode equal to Run Speed. Can jump vertically and horizontally.
Power.statAdjust: replace:Jump Speed; Combat Run Speed,replace:Combat Jump Speed; Combat Run Speed

Power.name: Jump 2
Power.Description: Further increases jump distance and height.
Power.Effect: Jump Speed = rank × Run Speed. Outside combat, move three times as fast.
Power.statAdjust: calc:Combat Jump Speed; Combat Run Speed x Rank,calc:Jump Speed; Combat Run Speed x Rank x 3

Power.name: Jump 3
Power.Description: Maximizes jumping ability.
Power.Effect: Outside combat, jump up to 50× Jump Speed.
Power.statAdjust: calc:Jump Speed; Combat Jump Speed x 50

Power.name: Keep Moving
Power.Description: Grants edge on movement-based actions to avoid attacks.
Power.Trigger: Ally in line of sight and earshot demoralized or stunned
Power.Effect: Ends demoralized or stunned condition on ally.

Power.name: Kill Zone
Power.Description: Creates an area of concentrated attack for extra damage.
Power.Trigger: Enemy starts moving in line of sight
Power.Effect: Ranged attack. Success: normal damage; Fantastic: double damage. Each target affected once per round. Character regains reaction.

Power.name: Leaping Leglock
Power.Description: Allows a grapple or leg attack while jumping.
Power.PreRequisites: Power:Flying Double Kick, Power:Crushing Grip, Rank:4
Power.Effect: Close attack. Success: grab + regular damage; Fantastic: double damage + grabbed and stunned 1 round. Both knocked prone.

Power.name: Leech Life
Power.Description: Drains health from a target to heal the user.
Power.Effect: Ego attack vs Resilience. Success: target takes Health damage, character heals half; Fantastic: character heals full Health damage.

Power.name: Leg Sweep
Power.Description: Tripping attack to knock down enemies.
Power.Effect: Close attack. Success: enemy takes regular damage and knocked prone; Fantastic: enemy stunned 1 round.

Power.name: Levitation
Power.Description: Allows hovering or floating off the ground.
Power.Effect: Move through air in any direction at Run Speed.

Power.name: Lightning Actions
Power.Description: Increases speed of actions in combat.
Power.Effect: Gain one extra standard action + one extra reaction per turn. Can turn Marvel die to Fantastic success for initiative.

Power.name: Machine Telepathy
Power.Description: Reads or controls machines mentally.
Power.Effect: Communicate telepathically with one machine at a time. Must have met or seen the machine. Can be verbal, visual, or complex info (e.g., location). Unlimited distance within same dimension. Logic checks may bypass security on complex machines.

Power.name: Macrodimensional Travel
Power.Description: Moves the character across large dimensional distances.
Power.Effect: Grow enough to travel into the Macroverse, Overspace, or other enlarged space dimensions. Return to normal size at will. Time and space rules differ in these dimensions (e.g., 1 hour Macroverse ≈ 1 month regular universe).

Power.name: Memory Blip
Power.Description: Erases or alters recent memories in a target.
Power.Effect: Cause target to forget up to 1 hour of memories. Logic check vs target's Logic defense. Success: memories forgotten; Fantastic: target has trouble recovering memories. Target can try Logic check to recover if suspicious; Fantastic success reveals who did it.

Power.name: Mental Punch
Power.Description: A telepathic attack that damages the mind.
Power.Effect: Melee attack vs target. Success: regular Focus damage; Fantastic: double Focus damage + target stunned 1 round.

Power.name: Mental Shelter
Power.Description: Protects the mind from intrusion or manipulation.
Power.Effect: Extend mental defenses to protect chosen people within 5 spaces × rank. Protected targets gain Focus Damage Reduction equal to character's Uncanny power.

Power.name: Microdimensional Travel
Power.Description: Allows tiny, precise dimensional movement.
Power.Effect: Shrink enough to travel into subatomic realms. Return to normal size at will. Time and space rules differ in these realms. Useful for hiding, but little else of interest.

Power.name: Mighty 1
Power.Description: Grants a bonus to strength-based actions.
Power.Effect: Treat character as 1 size larger for lifting, carrying, swinging, and throwing. +1 Melee damage multiplier, +1 bonus to non-attack Melee checks.

Power.name: Mighty 2
Power.Description: Further increases strength and damage output.
Power.Effect: Treat character as 2 sizes larger for lifting, carrying, swinging, and throwing. +2 Melee damage multiplier, +2 bonus to non-attack Melee checks.

Power.name: Mighty 3
Power.Description: Significantly boosts strength and related abilities.
Power.Effect: Treat character as 3 sizes larger for lifting, carrying, swinging, and throwing. +3 Melee damage multiplier, +3 bonus to non-attack Melee checks.

Power.name: Mighty 4
Power.Description: Maximizes strength and power.
Power.Effect: Treat character as 4 sizes larger for lifting, carrying, swinging, and throwing. +4 Melee damage multiplier, +4 bonus to non-attack Melee checks.

Power.name: Mind Interrogation
Power.Description: Extracts information from a target’s mind.
Power.Effect: Delve into a target's mind via telepathic link. Logic check vs Logic defense. Success: ask one simple question and get answer; Fantastic: get more complex information.

Power.name: Mind Reading
Power.Description: Reads surface thoughts of a target.
Power.Effect: Read surface thoughts of a linked target. Logic check vs Logic defense. Success: surface thoughts; Fantastic: ask one simple question and get answer.

Power.name: Mirage
Power.Description: Creates a visual illusion to mislead enemies.
Power.Effect: Create a full-sensory mirage affecting linked target. Mirage can be anything desired and move freely.

Power.name: Mirror Images
Power.Description: Generates illusory duplicates to confuse foes.
Power.Effect: Create one sound and sight illusion duplicate per rank. Duplicates look and sound like character, under complete control. Move up to 10 spaces, swap places, mimic attacks. Hit removes duplicate; successful attack or reveal ends illusion.

Power.name: Mists of Morpheus
Power.Description: Envelops an area in sleep-inducing mist.
Power.Effect: Ego check vs Vigilance defense. Success: target stunned while concentrating; Fantastic: target falls asleep.

Power.name: Mists of Munnopor
Power.Description: A mystical fog that obscures vision and confuses targets.
Power.Effect: Create thick fog up to 100 spaces per rank. Blocks line of sight beyond 10 spaces. Prevents flying, gliding, or webslinging within fog.

Power.name: Molecular Destabilization
Power.Description: Destroys or weakens matter at a molecular level.
Power.Effect: Make a close attack against an object their size or smaller. Success: object explodes; targets within 2 spaces take regular damage. Fantastic success: double damage and ignore Health Damage Reduction.

Power.name: Multiversal Portal
Power.Description: Opens a gateway to another universe.
Power.Effect: Opens a glowing portal next to character that moves anything entering it to a clear space in another universe previously visited. Can close at will. Portal is two-way.

Power.name: Multiversal Travel
Power.Description: Allows the character to move between universes.
Power.Effect: Instantly moves from one universe to another. Arrival location is a place they've been, or closest available corresponding space.

Power.name: Multiversal Travel Other
Power.Description: Transports other targets across universes.
Power.Effect: Ego check vs target's Vigilance. Success: send target to another universe; target arrives in any previously visited location, otherwise closest corresponding space.

Power.name: Multiversal Travel Together
Power.Description: Moves a group through the multiverse as one.
Power.Effect: Character moves to another universe, taking any touched target along. Arrival location is a place they've been or closest corresponding space.

Power.name: On Your Feet
Power.Description: Grants edge on standing up from prone or being knocked down.
Power.Trigger: Ally in line of sight and earshot is knocked prone
Power.Effect: All prone allies within earshot immediately stand if able. Allies unable to stand are unaffected.

Power.name: Operations Center
Power.Description: Provides remote access to tactical or strategic information.
Power.Effect: Inspire allies within earshot up to character's Vigilance defense. Affected allies gain edge on all action checks until next turn. Concentration breaks if character uses movement.

Power.name: Orchestra of Overkill
Power.Description: Coordinates multiple attacks or effects for maximum damage.
Power.PreRequisites: Power:Dance Of Death, Power:Fast Hands, Rank:4
Power.Effect: Agility check vs all enemies within 10 spaces and line of sight. Success: half regular damage; Fantastic success: full damage + bleeding.

Power.name: Orders
Power.Description: Issues commands to allies with bonus effect.
Power.Effect: Give order to a target with telepathic link and no Focus. Logic check vs target's Logic defense. Success: target obeys; Fantastic: character gains edge next use on same target. Orders must be completable in ≤1 hour.

Power.name: Partial Phase
Power.Description: Allows partial intangibility to avoid attacks or obstacles.
Power.Effect: Make any portion of body and clothing tangible or intangible at will.

Power.name: Penance Stare
Power.Description: Inflicts psychic damage based on the target’s guilt.
Power.Effect: Ego attack vs target within 3 spaces per rank. Success: Focus damage; Fantastic: double damage + target paralyzed 1 round. Heroic targets take half damage. Shattered targets recover either cleansed or emotionally drained, per Narrator.

Power.name: Phase Object
Power.Description: Makes an object intangible to pass through matter.
Power.Effect: Make any touched object intangible, up to rank sizes bigger than self. Includes attached or contained items.

Power.name: Phase Other
Power.Description: Renders another target intangible.
Power.Effect: Make any touched person and clothing intangible. Can include anyone they are touching. Phasing ends if contact broken. Objects disrupted may damage phased targets.

Power.name: Phase Self
Power.Description: Makes oneself intangible to avoid attacks or pass through objects.
Power.Effect: Character and clothing become intangible. Can move through anything. Cannot affect or be affected by non-phased objects.

Power.name: Phase Walk
Power.Description: Allows phased movement through obstacles or walls.
Power.Effect: Move freely through anything while phasing, at Run Speed. Can carry anything phasing with them.

Power.name: Point-Blank Parry
Power.Description: Grants edge when parrying attacks at close range.
Power.Effect: Make ranged attack against enemy. Success: regular damage; Fantastic: double damage + bleeding.

Power.name: Possess Vehicle
Power.Description: Takes control of a vehicle temporarily.
Power.Effect: Take magical control of vehicle touched. Hellfire engulfs vehicle (no damage). Anyone contacting vehicle takes damage equal to rank. Fantastic: regular Health + Focus damage. Vehicle speed doubles, can climb walls and jump. Use Ego for checks with edge.

Power.name: Possession
Power.Description: Temporarily controls another creature or person.
Power.Effect: Ego check vs target's Ego defense. Success: take over target's body completely. Target can attempt Ego check to end possession. Heroic tag gives edges on checks. Harmful actions may trigger additional checks.

Power.name: Powerful Hex
Power.Description: Curses a target with a strong detrimental effect.
Power.Effect: Cast hex to use any other power of qualifying rank regardless of prerequisites. Pay regular Focus cost +5. Permanent powers count as Concentration; numbered permanent powers multiply Focus cost by number (e.g., Mighty 3 = 15 Focus).

Power.name: Probability-Manipulation Hex
Power.Description: Alters the likelihood of events for a target.
Power.Effect: When ally within 5 spaces × rank attempts a check with trouble, eliminates trouble and grants edge instead.

Power.name: Protection Hex
Power.Description: Grants defensive magical protection to a target.
Power.Effect: Produce hex to protect self. Make Ego check; result becomes defense against attacks. Can retry. Fantastic: grants Health Damage Reduction 1.

Power.name: Quick Phase
Power.Description: Phase through objects or obstacles rapidly.
Power.Effect: Character and clothing instantly become intangible.

Power.name: Quick Toss
Power.Description: Throws an object with extra speed and accuracy.
Power.Effect: Throw grabbed person at target. Range depends on Mighty level and size. Ranged attack against target: failure damages thrown person; success damages target; Fantastic knocks target prone.

Power.name: Rally on Me
Power.Description: Boosts allies’ morale or restores edge when nearby.
Power.Effect: Allies in earshot (up to Vigilance number) can move toward character at half speed. If within reach after move, recover Focus = 5 × character rank. Can use once per battle.

Power.name: Regain Focus
Power.Description: Recover spent edge or regain composure.
Power.Effect: Recover Focus equal to character's Vigilance.

Power.name: Reinforced Skeleton
Power.Description: Bones are stronger, reducing damage from impacts.
Power.Effect: Character gains Health Damage Reduction 1.

Power.name: Resize Object
Power.Description: Changes the size of a target object.
Power.Effect: Change size of any object within reach. Resize limits follow character's Grow or Shrink powers.

Power.name: Resize Other
Power.Description: Alters the size of a target creature or object.
Power.Effect: Resize any person and their clothing within touch, up to character's Grow or Shrink limits. Must grab unwilling targets first.

Power.name: Return Fire
Power.Description: Immediately responds to an attack with counterfire.
Power.Effect: Agility attack vs target's Vigilance defense. Success: damage bypasses Health DR, applied to Focus. Fantastic: double damage, target stunned 1 round if Focus damaged.

Power.name: Reverse Punch
Power.Description: A punch that uses an opponent’s momentum against them.
Power.Effect: Close attack on enemy with edge. Success: regular damage; Fantastic: double damage + stun 1 round.

Power.name: Reverse-Momentum Throw
Power.Description: Throws an enemy using their own force to increase damage.
Power.Trigger: While Defense Stance active, a close attack against character misses
Power.Effect: Attacker is knocked prone and takes half the damage their attack would have dealt.

Power.name: Rico-Shield
Power.Description: Throws a shield that ricochets between targets.
Power.Effect: Ranged attack on target. Success: regular damage; Fantastic: target knocked prone and chain attack on next target. Shield returns to character after all attacks.

Power.name: Riposte
Power.Description: Counters an opponent’s attack with an immediate strike.
Power.Trigger: Enemy makes close attack that fails
Power.Effect: Close attack on enemy. Success: regular damage; Fantastic: double damage + weapon special effect.

Power.name: Rubberneck
Power.Description: Increases flexibility of the neck and head to avoid attacks.
Power.Effect: Move head away from body up to reach to establish line of sight.

Power.name: Run on Water
Power.Description: Grants the ability to move across water surfaces.
Power.Effect: Feet skip across water. Continuous running prevents sinking.

Power.name: Scatter
Power.Description: Disperses effects or attacks across multiple targets.
Power.Trigger: Enemy in line of sight declares attack on ally within earshot
Power.Effect: Allies in earshot (up to character rank) move away at half speed and fall prone. If this prevents initial attack from hitting, attack fails automatically.

Power.name: Sense Sins
Power.Description: Detects moral wrongdoing in a target.
Power.Effect: Ego check vs target's Ego defense. Success: sense past horrible deeds. Fantastic: sense immediate intended actions.

Power.name: Sense Supernatural
Power.Description: Detects mystical or supernatural phenomena.
Power.Effect: Sense supernatural entities within 100 spaces × rank. Location and general status revealed. Ego check vs Vigilance if targets wish to remain hidden. Fantastic: identify if cursed or demonic.

Power.name: Shape-Shift
Power.Description: Alters physical form into another creature or object.
Power.Effect: Change into another form no more than one size larger/smaller. Gains natural abilities of form (e.g., flying as bird, breathing underwater as fish).

Power.name: Shield
Power.Description: Provides a basic defensive barrier.
Power.Effect: Character gains Health Damage Reduction 1.

Power.name: Shield 2
Power.Description: Improved defensive barrier with extra protection.
Power.Effect: Character gains Health Damage Reduction 2.

Power.name: Shield 3
Power.Description: Further enhancement to protective shielding.
Power.Effect: Character gains Health Damage Reduction 3.

Power.name: Shield 4
Power.Description: Maximizes defensive shielding capabilities.
Power.Effect: Character gains Health Damage Reduction 4.

Power.name: Shield Bash
Power.Description: Uses a shield to attack and potentially knock down an enemy.
Power.Effect: Close attack on enemy within reach. Success: regular damage; Fantastic: double damage and target knocked prone.

Power.name: Shield Deflection
Power.Description: Deflects incoming attacks using a shield.
Power.Trigger: Character is target of attack against Agility defense
Power.Effect: Attack has trouble.

Power.name: Shield of the Seraphim
Power.Description: A powerful, mystical shield that offers superior defense.
Power.Effect: Magical shield protects from physical damage. Attacks ≤20 damage absorbed; attacks >20 destroy shield. Character unharmed either way.

Power.name: Shield Wall
Power.Description: Creates a barrier with allies for group defense.
Power.Effect: Attacks against character have trouble. Breaks concentration if character moves.

Power.name: Shrink 1
Power.Description: Reduces size slightly, gaining edge on stealth or avoidance.
Power.Effect: Character can shrink to little size; return to normal at will.

Power.name: Shrink 2
Power.Description: Further reduces size and increases stealth advantages.
Power.Effect: Character can shrink to tiny size; return to normal at will.

Power.name: Shrink 3
Power.Description: Significantly shrinks, gaining greater evasion and small-object access.
Power.Effect: Character can shrink to miniature size; return to normal at will.

Power.name: Shrink 4
Power.Description: Maximizes size reduction for extreme stealth and maneuvering.
Power.Effect: Character can shrink to microscopic size; return to normal at will.

Power.name: Shrinking Dodge
Power.Description: Improves evasion when small or reduced in size.
Power.Effect: Attacker has trouble on attack.

Power.name: Shut Down Powers
Power.Description: Temporarily disables a target’s powers.
Power.Effect: Ego attack on target within 20 spaces. Success: removes all target powers. Must pay highest cost or minimum 15 Focus.

Power.name: Silence Area
Power.Description: Suppresses sound in a defined area.
Power.Effect: Area (5 spaces × rank, within 50 spaces) becomes silent. Cannot hear inside/outside. Must stay within 50 spaces to maintain.

Power.name: Silence Self
Power.Description: Suppresses one’s own sound to avoid detection.
Power.Effect: Character makes no noise unless desired. Edge on Agility to sneak; enemies have trouble perceiving them.

Power.name: Slip Free
Power.Description: Grants edge to escape grapples or restraints.
Power.Effect: Character cannot be grabbed or pinned.

Power.name: Slow-Motion Dodge
Power.Description: React in slow-motion to avoid attacks with edge.
Power.Effect: Enemy has trouble on attack.

Power.name: Slow-Motion Shoot-Dodge
Power.Description: Combine movement and attack while avoiding hits.
Power.Effect: Split ranged attack on two targets or focus one. Success: half damage; Fantastic: full damage + bonus attack. Character hovers midair, attacks against Agility have trouble until next turn, then falls prone.

Power.name: Smash
Power.Description: Delivers a powerful strike to cause extra damage.
Power.Effect: Close attack with edge. Add +1 Melee damage per 2 Focus spent. Success: normal damage; Fantastic: double damage and stun 1 round.

Power.name: Snap Shooting
Power.Description: Fires quickly with edge on accuracy.
Power.Effect: Split ranged attack on two targets or focus one. Success: half damage; Fantastic: full damage + target bleeding.

Power.name: Sniping
Power.Description: Long-range attacks with precision bonus.
Power.Effect: Ranged attack on enemy ≥20 spaces away. Success: regular damage; Fantastic: triple damage.

Power.name: Speed Blast
Power.Description: Boosts movement speed for rapid action.
Power.Effect: Ranged attack. Success: target stunned 1 round; Fantastic: target stunned, character knocked prone.

Power.name: Speed Run 1
Power.Description: Grants high-speed movement temporarily.
Power.Effect: Multiply Run Speed by rank. Outside combat: move 3× faster.
Power.statAdjust: calc:Combat Run Speed; Combat Run Speed x Rank, calc: Run Speed; Combat Run Speed x 3

Power.name: Speed Run 2
Power.Description: Further increases running speed and maneuverability.
Power.Effect: Outside combat, move up to 50× increased Run Speed.
Power.statAdjust: calc: Run Speed; Combat Run Speed x 50

Power.name: Speed Swim
Power.Description: Allows faster movement in water.
Power.Effect: Multiply Swim Speed by rank. Outside combat: move 3× faster.
Power.statAdjust: calc:Combat Swim Speed; Combat Run Speed x Rank, calc: Swim Speed: Combat Run Speed x Rank x 3

Power.name: Spider-Dodge
Power.Description: Improves reflexive evasion, especially acrobatic.
Power.Effect: Attacker has trouble. If attack misses, character may leap at Jump Speed.

Power.name: Spider-Pheromones
Power.Description: Emits pheromones that attract or repel.
Power.Effect: Edge on Ego (Intimidation) vs people not attracted to character’s gender; Edge on Ego (Persuasion) vs attracted people.

Power.name: Spider-Sense
Power.Description: Warns of danger through heightened perception.
Power.Effect: Edge on initiative and Vigilance. Enemies have trouble on Agility attacks vs Vigilance. Permanent bonus to Agility defense.

Power.name: Spider-Strike
Power.Description: Acrobatic attack that gains edge from mobility.
Power.Effect: Split close attack on two targets or focus one. Success: half damage; Fantastic: full damage + paralyzed by webbing. After attack: free half-speed run, jump, or climb.

Power.name: Spin-Throw
Power.Description: Uses spinning motion to throw an enemy or object with added force.
Power.Effect: Melee attack. Success: regular damage + knock prone; Fantastic: double damage, prone, pinned, stunned 1 round. Enemy can be moved within reach.

Power.name: Static Illusion
Power.Description: Creates an immobile visual illusion to distract.
Power.Effect: Create visual-only static illusion within line of sight, 50 spaces. Max size: 3× character. Concentration breaks if moving beyond 50 spaces or losing line of sight.

Power.name: Steal Powers
Power.Description: Temporarily gains abilities from another target.
Power.PreRequisites: Power:Clone Powers, Power:Shut Down Powers, Rank:4
Power.Effect: Ego attack on grabbed target. Success: remove all target powers and take them for self. Must pay cost of powers (or min 15 Focus). Costs for using powers are paid normally.

Power.name: Stilt Steps
Power.Description: Increase height and stride for movement or reach.
Power.Effect: Run Speed and Climb Speed double for this movement.

Power.name: Stopping Power
Power.Description: Improves ability to halt or resist movement or attacks.
Power.Effect: Ranged attack. Success: regular damage; Fantastic: double damage + another regular attack on same target.

Power.name: Sturdy 1
Power.Description: Grants resistance to damage or knockback.
Power.Effect: Health Damage Reduction 1

Power.name: Sturdy 2
Power.Description: Further improves durability.
Power.Effect: Health Damage Reduction 2

Power.name: Sturdy 3
Power.Description: Significantly increases resilience.
Power.Effect: Health Damage Reduction 3

Power.name: Sturdy 4
Power.Description: Maximizes toughness and damage resistance.
Power.Effect: Health Damage Reduction 4

Power.name: Summon Portal
Power.Description: Opens a portal to another location or dimension.
Power.Effect: Opens a glowing portal between two locations in the Multiverse. Anything can move through until closed.

Power.name: Supernova
Power.Description: Generates a massive burst of energy to damage multiple targets.
Power.Effect: Ego attack against all enemies within 10 spaces; success = half damage, Fantastic success = full damage + elemental effect.

Power.name: Suppressive Fire
Power.Description: Continuous ranged attacks to keep enemies at bay.
Power.Effect: Agility attack against target's Vigilance; damage to target's Focus on success, double Focus damage + stun on Fantastic success.

Power.name: Swipe Power
Power.Description: Sweeping attack that affects multiple targets.
Power.Effect: Remove one of target's powers and take it for own use.

Power.name: Telekinetic Attack
Power.Description: Uses telekinesis to strike or damage a target.
Power.Effect: Logic attack against target's Melee defense; success = regular damage, Fantastic success = double + stun 1 round.

Power.name: Telekinetic Barrier
Power.Description: Creates a defensive barrier using telekinesis.
Power.Effect: Creates invisible barrier; controls target placement and absorbs attacks ≤10 damage.

Power.name: Telekinetic Crush
Power.Description: Crushes objects or enemies with telekinetic force.
Power.Effect: Logic attack vs grabbed target's Resilience; success = regular damage, Fantastic = double + pinned.

Power.name: Telekinetic Grab
Power.Description: Grabs and holds objects or enemies telekinetically.
Power.Effect: Logic attack to grab target; Fantastic success also pins target.

Power.name: Telekinetic Manipulation
Power.Description: Manipulates multiple objects or targets at once.
Power.Effect: Manipulate objects in line of sight; Logic vs Agility if resisted.

Power.name: Telekinetic Protection
Power.Description: Enhances defenses using telekinetic force.
Power.Effect: Personal telekinetic shield absorbs attacks ≤10 damage; destroyed if >10, but user unharmed.

Power.name: Telekinetic Protection 2
Power.Description: Improved telekinetic shielding.
Power.Effect: Telekinetic shield absorbs ≤20 damage; destroyed if more, user unharmed.

Power.name: Telekinetic Protection 3
Power.Description: Further strengthens telekinetic defenses.
Power.Effect: Telekinetic shield absorbs ≤30 damage; destroyed if more, user unharmed.

Power.name: Telekinetic Protection Z
Power.Description: Maximizes telekinetic defensive capabilities.
Power.Effect: Telekinetic shield absorbs ≤40 damage; destroyed if more, user unharmed.

Power.name: Telekinetic Reinforcement
Power.Description: Boosts strength or durability of objects or allies.
Power.Effect: Damage that gets through telekinetic protection is applied to Focus instead, leaving shield intact.

Power.name: Telekinetic Sphere
Power.Description: Creates a floating protective or offensive sphere.
Power.Effect: Protective sphere envelops self and allies; can move unwanted enemies outside; absorbs attacks like Telekinetic Protection.

Power.name: Telekinetic Toss
Power.Description: Throws objects with telekinetic force.
Power.Effect: Throw a grabbed target at another target; Logic vs Agility; success = regular damage, Fantastic = target knocked prone.

Power.name: Telepathic Blast
Power.Description: Damages or disrupts targets mentally.
Power.Effect: Logic attack vs target in line of sight; success = regular Focus damage, Fantastic = double + stun 1 round.

Power.name: Telepathic Link
Power.Description: Establishes a mental link between allies.
Power.Effect: Telepathic communication with one person met or seen before; Logic vs Vigilance to force if target resists.

Power.name: Telepathic Network
Power.Description: Connects multiple minds for coordinated action.
Power.Effect: Telepathic communication with group up to 5 per rank, as long as everyone met or seen before.

Power.name: Telepathic Possession
Power.Description: Temporarily controls a target mentally.
Power.Effect: Possess a target with established Telepathic Link who has no Focus. Logic check vs target's Logic. Can permanently transfer mind into empty-minded targets.

Power.name: Teleport 1
Power.Description: Allows short-range teleportation.
Power.Effect: Teleport into a clear space up to 10×Rank spaces; outside combat 100×Rank.
Power.statAdjust: calc:Combat Teleport Speed;Rank x 10, calc:Teleport Speed;Rank x 100

Power.name: Teleport 2
Power.Description: Improves teleportation distance and accuracy.
Power.Effect: Outside combat, teleport up to 1,000×Rank spaces.

Power.name: Teleport Blind
Power.Description: Teleports without needing line of sight.
Power.Effect: Teleport to a location never seen before, up to 10×Rank spaces; outside combat 100×Rank. Teleporting into solids causes damage and possible trapping.

Power.name: Teleport Object
Power.Description: Teleports objects to a target location.
Power.Effect: Teleport an object within reach along with self. Object can be up to Rank sizes bigger than character.

Power.name: Teleport Other
Power.Description: Transports another person or creature.
Power.Effect: Make Ego check vs target's Vigilance to teleport target; colliding with solid material causes damage and possible trapping.

Power.name: Teleport Together
Power.Description: Teleports a group of allies simultaneously.
Power.Effect: Teleport self and any touched allies up to 10×Rank spaces; outside combat 100×Rank. Must grab unwilling targets first.

Power.name: Teleportal
Power.Description: Creates a fixed portal for repeated travel.
Power.Effect: Open a glowing portal linking two spaces, up to 10×Rank in combat, 1,000×Rank outside combat. Anything can pass until closed.

Power.name: Thunder
Power.Description: Generates a loud, damaging sonic effect.
Power.Effect: Ego check vs Resilience of all targets within 10 spaces. Success = deafened; Fantastic = deafened + stunned 1 round.

Power.name: Time-Out
Power.Description: Pauses or slows time for a target briefly.
