Power.Effect: Freeze time for self, act normally while everyone else appears frozen.

Power.name: Time-Out Bubble
Power.Description: Creates an area where time is slowed or stopped.
Power.Effect: Create a time bubble affecting self and allies within 1×Rank spaces; act normally while others are frozen.

Power.name: Time-Out Tag
Power.Description: Applies brief temporal effects on targets within range.
Power.Effect: Freeze time for one target within reach. Must grab unwilling target first.

Power.name: Time Portal
Power.Description: Opens a gateway through time.
Power.Effect: Open a time portal connecting two periods in a clear location; anything can move through until closed.

Power.name: Time Travel
Power.Description: Moves the character through time themselves.
Power.Effect: Instantly move from current time to another; arrive at known location or closest corresponding space.

Power.name: Time Travel Other
Power.Description: Transports others through time.
Power.Effect: Send grabbed target to another time. Must be a known location or closest corresponding space.

Power.name: Time Travel Together
Power.Description: Allows a group to travel through time as one.
Power.Effect: Move to another time taking any touched person with self; must grab unwilling targets first. Arrive at known location or closest corresponding space.

Power.name: Uncanny 1
Power.Description: Grants minor edge to avoid danger or react unusually.
Power.Effect: Reduce any damage multiplier against Focus by 1. Apply Tech Reliance if removable.

Power.name: Uncanny 2
Power.Description: Improves uncanny reflexes or luck.
Power.Effect: Reduce any damage multiplier against Focus by 2.

Power.name: Uncanny 3
Power.Description: Significantly increases chances of avoiding danger.
Power.Effect: Reduce any damage multiplier against Focus by 3.

Power.name: Uncanny 4
Power.Description: Maximizes uncanny avoidance and reaction capabilities.
Power.Effect: Reduce any damage multiplier against Focus by 4.

Power.name: Unflappable Poise
Power.Description: Grants composure under pressure, resisting mental effects.
Power.Effect: Close attacks have trouble; double trouble while using Defense Stance.

Power.name: Unrelenting Smash
Power.Description: Delivers repeated powerful strikes in succession.
Power.Effect: Melee attack vs all enemies in reach; success = half damage, Fantastic = full damage + prone. Can repeat paying 15 Focus per extra attack.

Power.name: Unstoppable Assault
Power.Description: Increases damage and edge on continuous attacks.
Power.Effect: Melee check vs all enemies in reach. Success = half damage; Fantastic = full damage + weapon special effect. Can repeat paying 15 Focus and moving up to half Speed. Each target affected once per round.

Power.name: Untouchable Position
Power.Description: Grants edge to avoid being hit or grappled.
Power.Effect: Other close attacks against character have trouble until start of next turn.

Power.name: Vapors of Valtorr
Power.Description: Emits damaging or obscuring mystical vapors.
Power.Effect: Create inky mist up to 25 spaces per rank; blocks line of sight beyond 5 spaces. Later turns can attack one target per turn, Ego check vs Vigilance. Success = regular damage; Fantastic = double damage + blind 1 turn.

Power.name: Venom Blast
Power.Description: Projects venomous energy to damage or poison targets.
Power.Effect: Ranged attack; Success = regular damage; Fantastic = double damage + stunned 1 round if damage dealt.

Power.name: Vicious Attack
Power.Description: Enhances attack damage and effectiveness.
Power.Effect: Close attack; Success = regular damage; Fantastic = double damage + weapon special effect.

Power.name: Wallcrawling
Power.Description: Allows climbing on walls and ceilings with ease.
Power.Effect: Climb at speed equal to regular speed; never lose grip under normal conditions.

Power.name: Weapons Blazing
Power.Description: Grants edge when using multiple weapons simultaneously.
Power.Effect: Split attack for two ranged attacks against separate targets or focus single target. Agility check vs targets. Success = half damage; Fantastic = full damage + bonus attack.

Power.name: Weather Chill
Power.Description: Manipulates cold weather to hinder or damage enemies.
Power.Effect: Lower temperature in area ~1 mile across to 0°F.

Power.name: Weather Warm
Power.Description: Manipulates heat to aid or damage targets.
Power.Effect: Raise temperature in area ~1 mile across to 1000°F.

Power.name: Webcasting
Power.Description: Projects web-like energy for offense or support.
Power.Effect: Ranged attack; Success = paralyze target; Fantastic = pin target. Break free: Melee check TN 20.

Power.name: Webgliding
Power.Description: Allows gliding using web lines.
Power.Effect: Gain Glide movement mode at double Run Speed.
Power.statAdjust: calc:Combat Glide Speed;2 x Combat Run Speed,replace;Glide Speed;Combat Glide Speed

Power.name: Webgrabbing
Power.Description: Captures or restrains targets with webs.
Power.Effect: Ranged attack; Success = grab target; Fantastic = grab + pin. Break free: Melee check TN 20.

Power.name: Webslinging
Power.Description: Swing or traverse using web lines.
Power.Effect: Gain swingline movement mode at triple Run Speed. Reach = Swingline Speed.

Power.name: Webtrapping
Power.Description: Sets web traps to immobilize enemies.
Power.Effect: Fill up to 5 spaces with sticky webs. Spaces = difficult terrain. Creatures in spaces must make Agility check TN 20 or be paralyzed. Break free: Melee check TN 20.

Power.name: Whirling Frenzy
Power.Description: Spin attack that hits multiple enemies.
Power.Effect: Agility check vs all enemies in reach. Success = half damage; Fantastic = full damage + weapon special effect.

Power.name: Winds of Watoomb (Sorcery Set)
Power.Description: Generates mystical wind effects for attack or movement.
Power.Trigger: Damage gets through Shield of the Seraphim
Power.Effect: Conjure swirling winds; halve foe movement within 10 spaces per Rank. Can push away smoke/mist: Ego check vs opposing controller; success ends effect; Fantastic knocks prone. Can transfer damage through Shield of Seraphim to Focus instead.

Power.name: Wisdom
Power.Description: Grants insight or edge on knowledge-based checks.
Power.Effect: Use Ego defense against Logic attacks.

Power.name: Wisecracker
Power.Description: Uses humor or cleverness to distract or undermine foes.
Power.Trigger: Character succeeds in attack on enemy in earshot, or enemy fails attack in earshot
Power.Effect: Ego attack on enemy; Success = regular Focus damage; Fantastic = double Focus damage + target stunned 1 round.

Power.name: Charmed Life
Power.Description: The character seems like they were born lucky.
Power.Effect: The character gains an edge on any single action check each round. This does not stack with any other edges.
Power.statAdjust: replace: Logic Defence Score: Ego Defence Score

Power.name: Copy Psyche
Power.Description: The character can move whole minds around.
Power.Effect: Copy the mind of a linked person and store in own mind; rules for storing, removing, and interacting with extra minds.

Power.name: Cosmic Awareness
Power.Description: The character can detect details about things anywhere in the universe.
Power.Effect: Sense selected things at any distance in the same universe; includes location, velocity, and status of known items, creatures, or groups.

Power.name: Cure-All
Power.Description: The character can cure what ails—mostly.
Power.Effect: Cures most temporary ailments on touch (Ego vs TN 12). Fantastic success recovers health/focus. Only affects acute, not chronic/permanent, conditions.

Power.name: Danger Sense
Power.Description: The character can feel danger on the way.
Power.Effect: Character gets a turn during the bonus round of any combat, even without a fantastic initiative result.

Power.name: Detect Supers
Power.Description: The character can sense super-powered people.
Power.Effect: Can sense anyone with superpowers within a certain distance. Reveals count/direction/distance. Range 5 miles (general)/25 miles (single origin). Powers from Special Training origin not detected.

Power.name: Evil Eye
Power.Description: The character can inflict trouble on those who cross their path.
Power.Effect: Target has trouble on all action checks for the duration. No range limit after activation. Focus spent each turn to maintain.

Power.name: Healing Hands
Power.Description: The character has a healing touch.
Power.Effect: Heals a target with a touch; each Focus spent restores 1 Health. Minimum 10 Focus. Cannot heal beyond max Health.

Power.name: Intuition
Power.Description: The character has a bad feeling about this.
Power.Effect: Player gets an idea from the Narrator about which choice would be best for them in the long run.

Power.name: Jinx You
Power.Description: The character can hit you with a jinx.
Power.Effect: On successful Melee check, target has trouble on all action checks for duration; fantastic success also deals Melee damage. Focus spent each turn to maintain.

Power.name: Jinx You All
Power.Description: The character can jinx a whole group of foes at once.
Power.Effect: Picks up to one foe per rank; those foes have trouble on all action checks for duration. No range limit after activation. Focus spent each turn to maintain.

Power.name: Let's Go
Power.Description: The character can get a friend back on their feet.
Power.Effect: Eliminates effects of a target losing all Health; target remains awake and mobile but can only use movement; does not prevent death; target falls unconscious if Health ≤0 when effect ends or Health increases above 0.

Power.name: Lucky Me
Power.Description: Things are about to go the character's way.
Power.Effect: The character gains an edge on all action checks while power is in effect. Focus cost paid each turn to maintain.

Power.name: Lucky Us
Power.Description: The character can share their good fortune with many friends.
Power.Effect: Picks up to one ally per rank in line of sight, self and allies gain edge on all action checks; no range limit after activation; Focus cost maintained per turn.

Power.name: Lucky You
Power.Description: The character can give good fortune to a friend.
Power.Effect: Touches an ally; that ally gains edge on all action checks for duration; Focus cost per turn to maintain.

Power.name: Microscopic Awareness
Power.Description: The character can detect details about the smallest things.
Power.Effect: See/identify items normally requiring microscope (e.g., fingerprints, hair, DNA); can identify/link DNA to relatives.

Power.name: Never Surrender
Power.Description: The character can help a friend rally.
Power.Effect: Removes effects of losing all Focus; target isn't demoralized/loses 'trouble' penalty, can't spend more Focus, can be shattered. Power ends if Focus >0. If still 0 Focus at end, target becomes demoralized.

Power.name: Postcognition 1
Power.Description: The character knows what just happened.
Power.Effect: Sense what happened to a person/place/item within reach in last 6 hours, using target's senses. Can review events, 'fast-forward'/'rewind' time period.

Power.name: Postcognition 2
Power.Description: The character knows what happened in the day.
Power.Effect: Sense what happened to a person/place/item within reach in last 24 hours; otherwise works as Postcognition 1.

Power.name: Postcognition 3
Power.Description: The character knows what happened in the year.
Power.Effect: Sense what happened to a person/place/item within reach in any 6-hour period in last year; otherwise as Postcognition 1.

Power.name: Postcognition 4
Power.Description: The character knows what happened in the past century.
Power.Effect: Sense what happened to a person/place/item within reach in any week-long period in past century; otherwise as Postcognition 1.

Power.name: Precognition 1
Power.Description: The character can see the near future.
Power.Effect: Gains sense of what will happen to person/place/item in next 24 hours; player may ask 1 question about day ahead and get an honest, short answer; predictions not guaranteed.

Power.name: Precognition 2
Power.Description: The character can see the week ahead.
Power.Effect: Gains sense of what will happen to a person/place/item within reach in next week; can also consider fate of something within a mile over next 24 hours; otherwise works as Precognition I.

Power.name: Precognition 3
Power.Description: The character can see the month ahead.
Power.Effect: Gains sense of what will happen to a person/place/item within reach in next month; alternatively can consider fate of something within a mile over next week or within 100 miles over next 24 hours; otherwise as Precognition I.

Power.name: Precognition 4
Power.Description: The character can see a whole year ahead.
Power.Effect: Gains sense of what will happen to a person/place/item within reach in next year; alternative ranges and time frames described; otherwise works as Precognition I.

Power.name: Razorwebs
Power.Description: The character's webbing can cut!
Power.Effect: Agility attack on enemy; success deals Health damage; fantastic success adds bleeding.

Power.name: Real Jinx
Power.Description: The character is bad luck for their foes.
Power.Effect: All direct-action attackers have trouble on their action checks; does not stack with other trouble.

Power.name: Repulse
Power.Description: The character can force things away.
Power.Effect: Can force something touching or nearly touching away like Stick Around power; targets resisting must pass Melee vs TN 16; can shove attackers, propel self, keep objects hovering (max height 1 space), or add distance to jumps.

Power.name: Restore
Power.Description: The character can heal a shattered mind.
Power.Effect: On Ego vs TN 20 check success, target restored to 1 Focus; fantastic success restores full Focus; user reduced to 1 Focus after any success; failure still pays 20 Focus.

Power.name: Resurrect
Power.Description: The character can help someone defy death.
Power.Effect: Makes Ego vs TN (10 + hours dead) action check; success restores target to 1 Health; fantastic success full Health; user reduced to 1 Focus after success; can only resurrect relatively intact bodies soon after death.

Power.name: Soothing Touch
Power.Description: The character can help get a friend's head back in the game.
Power.Effect: Restores target's Focus by spending Focus; minimum 10 Focus must be spent; cannot exceed target's max Focus; excess Focus lost.

Power.name: Stick Around
Power.Description: The character can make things stick together.
Power.Trigger: Someone attempts to move or move another within power's range
Power.Effect: Sticks two things together like Wallcrawling; breaking requires Melee vs TN 16; can end at will. Creative uses include sticking people, doors, or objects.

Power.name: Telespot
Power.Description: The character can create small teleportals.
Power.Effect: Deploys small teleportals to attack/affect items within 10x rank; as reaction can deflect or redirect attacks with Agility check; effects vary by success.

Power.name: Venom Bash
Power.Description: Charges up fist for bioelectric punch.
Power.Effect: Barehanded Melee attack; success deals Health damage; fantastic success doubles damage and stuns target one round.

Power.name: Venom Burst
Power.Description: Massive bioelectric charge.
Power.Effect: Melee check vs foes within 5 spaces; success knocks prone; fantastic success also does half Health damage.

Power.name: Venom Sword
Power.Description: Creates a sword of bioelectricity.
Power.Trigger: Character or ally within reach attacked
Power.Effect: Sword adds +2 Melee damage multiplier; fantastic success doubles damage and stuns. Bonuses don’t stack.

Power.name: Wish You Luck
Power.Description: Makes a friend lucky even from across the room.
Power.Effect: Ally in line of sight gains edge on all action checks; no range limit after activation; Focus cost per turn to maintain.

Power.name: Detect Lie
Power.Description: The character can identify if others are telling the truth.
Power.Effect: Can make Ego check vs communicator's defense; success reveals if lying, fantastic success reveals why; only works if communicator knows they are lying.

Power.name: Healing Hands
Power.Description: The character has a healing touch.
Power.Effect: Heals target by spending Focus; minimum 10 Focus; cannot exceed max Health; excess lost.

Power.name: Indecipherable
Power.Description: The character has a unique internal language.
Power.PreRequisites: Power:Understand Spoken Language, Power:Understand Unusual Communication, Rank:3
Power.Effect: Character thinks and communicates in own internal language, immune to telepathic powers like Mind Reading or Mind Interrogation.

Power.name: Power Slider
Power.Description: The character's power strength waxes and wanes based on vital criteria.
Power.Effect: Powers boosted or dampened depending on chosen criteria (confidence, faith, media popularity); boosts/dampens affect areas, durations, damage multipliers and Fantastic success effects for the duration of a combat or day.

Power.name: Swap Items
Power.Description: The character swaps items with someone.
Power.Effect: Swaps possessions with another person within 2 spaces per rank; must make Ego check if target unwilling; swapped items return when effect ends.

Power.name: Swap Places
Power.Description: The character swaps places with someone.
Power.Effect: Swaps places with target within 2 spaces per rank; Ego check if target unwilling; swaps back when effect ends.

Power.name: Swap Powers
Power.Description: The character swaps powers with a target.
Power.Effect: Swaps all non-swap powers with target within 2 spaces per rank; must pay highest cost or minimum 10 Focus; can use new powers normally; pay any cost when using swapped powers.

Power.name: Swap Status
Power.Description: The character swaps status with someone.
Power.Effect: Swaps entire or selective status with target within 2 spaces per rank; includes Lost Health, Focus, conditions, Occupations, Traits, Tags; careful as can cause deaths or shattering.

Power.name: Understand Body Language
Power.Description: The character can read body language.
Power.Effect: At first encounter with culture, Logic vs TN 13 check to learn body language; edge if language known; success allows understanding/emulation; fantastic success permanent understanding.

Power.name: Understand Code
Power.Description: The character can figure out any code.
Power.Effect: Logic vs TN 13 check on first encounter with code; edge if related language known; success allows understanding and communication; fantastic success permanent understanding.

Power.name: Understand Sign Language
Power.Description: The character can understand sign language.
Power.Effect: Logic vs TN 13 check on first encounter with sign language; edge if related language known; success allows understanding and signing; fantastic success permanent understanding.

Power.name: Understand Spoken Language
Power.Description: The character can understand spoken language.
Power.Effect: Logic vs TN 13 check on first encounter with spoken language; edge if related language known; success allows understanding and speaking; fantastic success permanent understanding.

Power.name: Understand Unusual Communication
Power.Description: The character can understand other communication forms.
Power.Effect: Logic vs TN 13 check on first encounter with unusual communication (not hearing, vision, or code); edge if known; success allows use; fantastic success permanent understanding; includes scent, touch, taste, etc.

Power.name: Understand Written Language
Power.Description: The character can understand written language.
Power.Effect: Logic vs TN 13 check on first encounter with written language; edge if related language known; success allows reading and writing; fantastic success permanent understanding.
